StringTable.Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Name
StringTable.String: Alien ruins found on planet

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Dec
StringTable.String: As our survey team traverses the rugged terrain of this world, a remarkable sight unfolds before them: the weathered remains of an ancient Precursor civilization. These ruins, vast and enigmatic, whisper tales of a bygone era, their secrets nestled in the dust of ages. The intricate architecture and undeciphered glyphs suggest a civilization of immense wisdom and power. [BR][BR]We are now at a crossroads: Do we preserve the sanctity of this archaeological wonder, leaving it untouched for a thorough investigation by a future governor? Or do we seize the moment, extracting the remnants of technology buried within, in hopes of gaining an immediate research advantage?

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Leave the ruins for later investigation.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_0_Details
StringTable.String: If we assign a governor to this world they will be able to investigate the ruins more carefully.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Extract what tech we can.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienRuins_0x4B3A_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: We will gain a one time research boon.

StringTable.Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet0x4B3A_Name
StringTable.String: Odd Gravity

StringTable.Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_0x4B3A_Dec
StringTable.String: Our engineers are excited about the unique construction possibilities offered by the odd gravity conditions of this planet. They believe we can harness these fluctuations to significantly reduce building costs.[BR][BR]What should be the policy for when or if we assign a governor here?

StringTable.Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Embrace the gravity anomaly for construction.

StringTable.Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_Choice_0_Details
StringTable.String: By leveraging the planet's unique gravity, we can drastically cut down on construction costs, albeit at the expense of higher ongoing maintenance.

StringTable.Label: Event_OddGravityPlanet_0x4B3A_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Proceed with standard construction methods.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExoticFauna0x4B4B_Name
StringTable.String: Exotic Fauna Discovery

StringTable.Label: Event_ExoticFauna_0x4B4B_Dec
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered a variety of exotic creatures on this new world. Their unique appearances and behaviors make them potentially valuable as exotic pets or novelties for export, but their alien nature could carry unforeseen risks.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExoticFauna_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Commercialize the exotic fauna.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExoticFauna_Choice_0_Details
StringTable.String: Turning these unique creatures into a lucrative export could boost our economy, though it may come with unforeseen consequences.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExoticFauna_0x4B4B_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Leave the creatures undisturbed.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAI0x4C5C_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor AI Found

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAI_0x4C5C_Dec
StringTable.String: A dormant AI from an ancient, advanced civilization has been discovered. If activated, it could significantly boost the productivity of this planet, but its alien origins pose potential risks.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAI_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Integrate the AI into our systems.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAI_Choice_0_Details
StringTable.String: Activating this AI could provide us with unprecedented technological advantages, though the safety of such an ancient system remains uncertain.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorAI_0x4C5C_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Avoid the risk and leave the AI dormant.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientCoreTap0x4D6D_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Core Tap Discovered

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_0x4D6D_Dec
StringTable.String: Our team has unearthed an ancient energy core tap, supposedly capable of providing unlimited energy. However, its original disconnection raises questions about its safety and stability.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Activate the core tap and boost our energy production.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_Choice_0_Details
StringTable.String: Utilizing this ancient technology could skyrocket our energy capabilities, potentially revolutionizing our production processes.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientCoreTap_0x4D6D_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Do not disturb the core tap. It may be disconnected for a reason.

StringTable.Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Leave orders for any future governor to strip mine this planet.

StringTable.Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_Choice_0_Consequence
StringTable.String: Embarking on this path could immensely boost our resources at the cost of significant environmental impact.

StringTable.Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_0x9C2A_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: We will not be strip mining this world.

StringTable.Label: Event_HarmonyCrystal_0x9C2A_Choice_1_Consequence
StringTable.String: Choosing this will maintain the planet's ecological balance but at the expense of valuable resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarTornPlanetCleanup0x7F1B_Name
StringTable.String: Legacy of a Nuclear Apocalypse

StringTable.Label: Event_WarTornPlanetCleanup_0x7F1B_Dec
StringTable.String: This planet, now a new home for our colony, bears the scars of a devastating nuclear war that occurred centuries ago. The remnants of this conflict pose significant challenges for our settlement.

StringTable.Label: Event_HarmonyCrystalDilemma0x9C2A_Name
StringTable.String: The Harmony Crystal Dilemma

StringTable.Label: Event_HarmonyCrystalDilemma_0x9C2A_Dec
StringTable.String: Our exploration team has discovered a field of sentient crystals on a new planet. Mining these crystals could bring immense wealth, but might also trigger unforeseen consequences. A faction of our scientists and ethicists urge caution, advocating to leave the crystals undisturbed.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarTornPlanetCleanup_0x7F1B_Bonus
StringTable.String: Removed fallout.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarTornPlanetCleanup_0x7F1B_Pollution
StringTable.String: Former Nuclear Apocalypse

StringTable.Label: Event_WarTornPlanet_Choice_Cleanup_Dec
StringTable.String: Initiate a planet-wide cleanup operation to remove the pollution left by the previous inhabitants.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarTornPlanet_Choice_Cleanup_Cost
StringTable.String: This action will incur maintenance costs but will significantly improve the planet's environment.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarTornPlanet_Choice_Ignore_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapt to the existing conditions and coexist with the pollution, avoiding additional expenses.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrinterRepair0x8A3C_Name
StringTable.String: Colony Ship's Auto Printer damaged

StringTable.Label: Event_PrinterRepair_0x8A3C_Dec
StringTable.String: Due to damage incurred during transit, our colony ship's auto printers are inoperative. A repair is crucial for maintaining our operational capabilities.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrinterRepair_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Understood.

StringTable.Label: Event_FoodProcessorBreakdown0x9E4D_Name
StringTable.String: Colony's Food Processor Broken

StringTable.Label: Event_FoodProcessorBreakdown_0x9E4D_Dec
StringTable.String: The colony's food processor is broken, leading to a halt in food production. Immediate action is required to avert a potential crisis.

StringTable.Label: Event_FoodProcessorBreakdown_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Fine. Repair it.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim0x5C3A_Name
StringTable.String: Unbihexium Deposit Claim

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_0x5C3A_Dec
StringTable.String: A settler group has claimed a deposit of Unbihexium and proposes to share it with a future governor, potentially causing resentment among others.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Choice_Share_Dec
StringTable.String: Agree to the sharing idea, enhancing the governor's happiness at the risk of causing resentment.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Choice_Persuade_Dec
StringTable.String: Persuade the group to share the Unbihexium with others, aiming for a more equitable distribution.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Success_Name
StringTable.String: Unbihexium Claim Success

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: Through successful negotiation, your colonist has agreed to share their rare Unbihexium resource, boosting our colony's wealth generation.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Success_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: This is a significant step towards prosperity for our colony.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Failure_Name
StringTable.String: Unbihexium Claim Negotiation Failure

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Persuade_Failure_Dec
StringTable.String: Despite our best efforts, the colonist refuses to share the Unbihexium resource.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnbihexiumClaim_Failure_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: There will be other opportunities.

StringTable.Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork0x7E4F_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Satellite Network Discovery

StringTable.Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork_0x7E4F_Dec
StringTable.String: This planet has an ancient satellite network. Although unstable, which we define as occasionally dropping to the surface, these leavings provide additional tech resources for any future governor.

StringTable.Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Well that's good. I think.

StringTable.Label: Event_SatelliteNetwork_Choice_0_Result
StringTable.String: Annoyed by Satellites

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor0x6B9D_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Food Processing Discovery

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor_0x6B9D_Dec
StringTable.String: A Precursor civilization food processing center has been found on this world. It could be highly beneficial if utilized by a governor.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor_Choice_Extract_Dec
StringTable.String: Extract the technology from the food processing machine for immediate use.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProcessor_Choice_Leave_Dec
StringTable.String: Leave the machine intact for a future governor to utilize.

StringTable.Label: Event_AtmosphericInterference0x6E2F_Name
StringTable.String: Atmospheric Clogging of Equipment

StringTable.Label: Event_AtmosphericInterference_0x6E2F_Dec
StringTable.String: The unique composition of the atmosphere is causing severe clogging in our equipment. Adjustments are needed, but will result in reduced operational capacity for the next couple of years.

StringTable.Label: Event_AtmosphericInterference_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: Understood.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadlordArchive0x9F2E_Name
StringTable.String: Dreadlord Archive Uncovered

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadlordArchive_0x9F2E_Dec
StringTable.String: An Archive of the ancient and malevolent Dreadlord civilization has been found. Studying it poses risks, but it could also be a source of valuable resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadlordArchive_Choice_Leave_Dec
StringTable.String: Leave the Archive untouched for a future governor to study or utilize.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadlordArchive_Choice_Extract_Dec
StringTable.String: Extract resources from the Archive, foregoing its potential knowledge.

StringTable.Label: Event_LuminousPlants0x8D4C_Name
StringTable.String: Planet of Luminous Plants

StringTable.Label: Event_LuminousPlants_0x8D4C_Dec
StringTable.String: This planet is covered with plants that brightly illuminate the night. While bothersome to some, they hold potential for substantial economic gain, albeit with environmental consequences.

StringTable.Label: Event_LuminousPlants_Choice_Defer_Dec
StringTable.String: Allow a future governor to decide the fate of these luminous plants.

StringTable.Label: Event_LuminousPlants_Choice_Spray_Dec
StringTable.String: Authorize an orbital spray to eradicate the plants for immediate economic benefit, but at the cost of increased pollution.

StringTable.Label: Event_LuminousPlants_Choice_Defer_Details
StringTable.String: Spawns 4 glowy stinky plants that are indestructable and lower citizen approval.

StringTable.Label: Event_LuminousPlants_Choice_Spray_Bonus
StringTable.String: Orbital Herbicide

StringTable.Label: AlienRuins_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Ruins

StringTable.Label: AlienRuins2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Ancient Arnorian ruins that can greatly improve research on this world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFoodProcessor_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Food Processor

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFoodProcessorShortDec
StringTable.String: Takes organic matter of any kind and synthesizes food from it.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordArchive_Name
StringTable.String: Dreadlord Archive

StringTable.Label: DreadLordArchiveShortDec
StringTable.String: This structure brims with knowledge and evil.

StringTable.Label: GlowyStinkyPlants_Name
StringTable.String: Glowy Stinky Plant

StringTable.Label: GlowyStinkyPlantsShortDec
StringTable.String: Not just indestructible, we have to spend money to keep them from spreading and not in a good way. Their glowy ooze is valuable at least.

StringTable.Label: SentientPlants_Name
StringTable.String: Sentient Plants

StringTable.Label: SentientPlants_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These beautiful, sentient plants share their insights with us.

StringTable.Label: SecuritySystem_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Security Monitor

StringTable.Label: SecuritySystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides eyes on everything monitor to reduce crime.

StringTable.Label: CoreTap_Name
StringTable.String: Core Tap

StringTable.Label: CoreTap_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Uses the planet's core as a source of power.

StringTable.Label: GalacticNexusPavilion_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Pavilion

StringTable.Label: GalacticNexusPavilion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A source of tourism for alien species.
